item.description:
This meetup starts Friday, January 2, 2009 and ends Sunday, January 4, 2009

Friday
- Arrive at Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club after 7:00 PM
- We'll have beer ($1 or $2) and wine ($3) available for purchase at the bar.

Saturday, January 3
- Join us at Wildcat mountain as our guest, you are eligible for discount Wildcat ski passes.
- Or feel free to ski at any other of the Mt. Washington Valley ski areas
- You might want to shop at many of North Conway's outlets!
4-7pm at a "Can't Say No" event
$12 Social Invite and Wedeln Guest Pass required. Please note, parking will be available in our lot and on the street. Do not park in private parking areas (or you will get towed like Michele and Billy last year!).

7pm-ish Dinner at the Maks (Need to RSVP by Tuesday Dec 30)

9pm-1am Flip Cup Night event
$12 Social Invite and Wedeln Guest Pass required.

Sunday
- Ski or Ride some more or pack it up and head for home
- Shop on the way home!

Only Meal is Saturday night dinner for $15. Please indicate in your RSVP if you want dinner Saturday Night!

Guest Fees are $20 per person per night.
You will need to bring your own bedding (twin sheets or sleeping bag) and pillow.
You will need to bring your own toiletries, slippers for the shower, etc...

Please answer the questions after you RSVP. Yes RSVPs will get directions to the house.

Thanks,
Jonathan Magsino
508-241-2727
item.how_to_find_us: Just come in - You will find all the Wedelns!
item.name: Post NYE Weekend (1/2/2009 - 1/4/2009)
